attributes.action: Reinstate the Burscough Curves on the Southport to Manchester rail line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Burscough Rail Curves were taken out in the 1960's. If reinstated rail passengers would have a direct link from Southport to Preston and Ormskirk and beyond. This would then decrease road traffic in line with Government policy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reinstate the Burscough Curves on the Southport to Manchester rail line.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=BurscoughCurves



Her Majesty's Government
